summary: `Just Put it in your Skyrim Folder where the TESV.exe is located
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ff00][size=4][u][b]Xanlosh Sweetfx Preset[/b][/u][/size][/color][/font]
[size=3]This is a simple Sweetfx Preset that makes your skyrim look more colorful and vibrant with nearly no FPS Drop(1-3 FPS).
This is my first real mod ;)
Please Endorse it if you like it.[/size]
[b][u][color=#00ff00][size=4]Little Tipps to get ENB like look without installing an additional ENB.[/size][/color][/u]
[/b][u]Ambient Occlusion(Nvidia Users)[/u]
[size=3]Open The Nvidia Control Panel>Manage 3D applications>Programsettings[/size]
[size=3]Chose TESV.exe in the Dropdown Menu Scroll down to Ambient Occlusion and chose your preffered mode([/size][color=#ff0000]this can hit your FPS depending on your System![/color][size=3])[/size]
[u]Dynamic DOF
[/u][size=3]To get a DOF without Enb you need The mod [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/?]Dynavision[/url][size=3].After you installed it go to your MCM menu and change the DOF mode to Dynamic.Now you have a enblike DOF effect with nearly no FPS hit.[/size]




[b][u][size=3]Recommanded Mods[/size][/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/?]Dynavision[/url] To get a Dynamic DOF effectÂ 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13049/?]Imaginator[/url] To tweak the colors ingame
author: Xanlosh
